statements: SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM financial_data WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT username, password FROM financial_data WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE access_level = 'user' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM financial_data WHERE access_level = 'admin' ORDER BY user_id DESC;

SELECT user_id, username FROM financial_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email FROM financial_data WHERE access_level = 'user' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE access_level = 'admin' AND username LIKE '%simon%';
SELECT username, email FROM financial_data WHERE username LIKE '%john%' ORDER BY email ASC;

SELECT username, user_id FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE balance > 1000.00 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, balance FROM users JOIN financial_data ON users.user_id = financial_data.user_id;
SELECT username, account_number FROM users JOIN financial_data ON users.user_id = financial_data.user_id WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance DESC;

SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;

SELECT id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE id > 3;

SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'John%';
SELECT id, data FROM financial_data WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT id, role_name FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT u.username, f.data FROM users u INNER JOIN financial_data f ON u.id = f.user_id;

SELECT id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE permission_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, data FROM financial_data ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE id = 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE role = 'User';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u INNER JOIN roles r ON u.role = r.id WHERE u.id = 10;
SELECT p.permission_name, f.data FROM permissions p INNER JOIN financial_data f ON p.id = f.permission_id WHERE f.user_id = 7;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM roles;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT p.permission_name, COUNT(rp.role_id) FROM permissions p LEFT JOIN role_permissions rp ON p.permission_id = rp.permission_id GROUP BY p.permission_name ORDER BY COUNT(rp.role_id) DESC;
